about.title: About

what.title: What's this?
what.content: This is a simple timeline viewer for Pokemon TCG Pocket events and stuff. It helps you keep track of which events are happening in the game, whether it's events, new pack release or other stuff.

features.title: Cool Features
list: See events in your local time

about.footer: Found a bug or have a suggestion? Feel free to open an issue on GitHub!
